content: What happens if you sleep with your feet facing the door?

I've heard some superstitions about sleeping with your feet facing the door, but I don't think there's any real scientific basis for them. Some people believe it can bring bad luck or even death, but I think that's just folklore. In reality, as long as you're comfortable, it shouldn't matter which direction your feet are pointing. But if you're worried about it, maybe try to adjust your sleeping position to face another direction.
